name: Gates of Trinity
description:
This game was made for the 5th Annual Driftwood Game Jam! This jam challenged people to make a short game using only default RPG Maker assets, and plugins provided they require no additional resources to function. 

In Gates of Trinity, alternate play between a mother, Aria, and her daughter Izzia, set twenty years apart. Following her mother's death, Izzia discovers an old journal belonging to Aria. The story inside recalls a turning point in Aria's life, with the consequences of her actions passing down to unravel lies - and possibly even Izzia's life. 

Gameplay sits at roughly 20 minutes, and is story-focused around a parallel world. Choose between four classes to use in quick, balanced combat complete with action sequences.
